page.title: 05RAINBOW FUCHSIAS SANDON
page.content: Rainbows End has 1.4 acres of land.It was built in 1968,which makes it over 17 years of age. They started selling fuchsias in 1980. They sell geraniums as well. In the whole world there are over 6,000 different varieties of fuchsia and they have 500 approx. varieties at the nursery. The best month of the year to sell their flowers is May and the worst month is January. At the moment they water the plants twice a day as it is summer and in winter once a week. Under some of the plants are volcanic stones, which soak up excess water from the plant's soil. Under the propagating bench are heating cables to keep the plants warm.
